Class PlayerWater

  • java.lang.Object
    • tiles.Player
      • tiles.PlayerWater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Connectable, Movable, Tile, WaterTile

    public class PlayerWater
extends Player
implements Connectable, WaterTile
    Author:
    Jelmer Firet a tile that acts as a player and as water acts as an active player that can be moved around connects to neighbouring water tiles (Water, BoulderWater, PlayerWater, Void)
